about_the_game:
Step into the boots of soldiers entrenched in one of history’s most intense conflicts. In Country – Vietnam is a co-op shooter that thrusts you and up to four friends directly into the thick of combat, where you’ll need to rely on your brothers in arms to survive and succeed.

 

 In Country – Vietnam was crafted out of a deep desire to experience authentic, boots-on-the-ground gameplay in a historical setting. With a focus on an engaging, chaotic gameplay loop, this game features intense strike packages like Napalm that light up the battlefield, ambushes in dense jungle foliage that create suspenseful encounters, and attention to detail that honors the conflict’s reality while ensuring a truly enjoyable gameplay experience.

 

Customize your soldier with various era appropriate outfits to best suit your mission’s needs. Whether you’re relaxing on the FOB or returning to base from a long patrol, your soldier is a representation of your experience and prowess on the battlefield.

In Country – Vietnam is a game created by gamers, for gamers. We are dedicated to developing this project alongside our community. Your feedback helps shape the future of the game. With regular updates, new missions, game modes, and future content planned beyond release, In Country – Vietnam will continue to evolve long after its initial launch. Join our Discord, share your thoughts, and become part of the community. Welcome to the fight.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features intense combat scenes that include realistic depictions of war violence.

short_description: Immerse yourself and your squad in the brutal intensity of jungle warfare. Experience the chaos of the Vietnam War as you and your team tackle strategic objectives, navigate dense foliage, and engage in firefights. Survive together or fall apart.
